s.text: All the pundits on This Week agree that the focus group's warm fuzzies for both Bushes underscore the GOP's shift away from the fiery, Reagan-invoking rhetoric of the 1995 House.
Tucker Carlson ( Late Edition ) and O'Beirne think McCain's and Bush's balancing acts show that the pro-life movement is still to be reckoned with.
